Hi,

I have wayback 1.6 and heritrix installed in a remote VM. Then Heritri=
x was running http://localhost:8086 and wayback is running http://localhost=
.archive.org:8080

Then I had a requirement to access both these from the p=
ublic ip of the remote VM.

So I was able to access the heritrix with publi=
c ip as http://public pi:8086

But for the wayback machine, when I tried to=
 access it via, http://localhost:8080, the wayback page comes. But when I c=
lick on the Take me Back button, the HTTP404 resource not found page comes.=
 Therefore I could not access the page from ip as well.

Please tell me the=
 steps I should take in order to access this from public ip.
